column5: Experience the elegant lake life in this home full of french antiques and art from listed artists such as Payes, Laloue, Walton and others. The finest furnishings imaginable all presented in a chic and comfortable setting. Gruene and New Braunfels are just a 20 minute drive away. Natural Bridge Caverns, San Antonio and Austin are all within 45 minutes. NOTE: This home has heightened security for the safety of our guests and our objects d' art. Write owner for other available dates!
column8: Canyon Lake at it's most elegant !!
